% Model with a minimal amount of element types. To test aba.

fixedbase base

prisjoint j0 0 1 0

rotjoint j1 1 0 0
% rigidbody without translation works fine! (changing translation in x-direction also)
rigidbody b2 0 1 0 0 0 0   1   1 1 1

		

endmodel
